ygData.subject: Re: Lydl The Great quest item
ygData.msgSnippet: by the way, I noticed that my faction got worse with OpalDarkbriar and something Rage.   Any idea who these folks are? From: Farr, Robert
ygData.messageBody:
by the way, I noticed that my faction got worse with OpalDarkbriar and
something Rage. Any idea who these folks are?






From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...> on 05/17/99 07:50 AM PDT

To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Lydl The Great quest item

From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>

It's a quest given by the wizard guildmaster in Freeport.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: jcent@... [SMTP:jcent@...]
> Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 9:48 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Cc: rathe@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Lydl The Great quest item
>
> From: jcent@...
>
>
> I received a 'Locked Book' from the corpse of Lydl The Great, outside of
> Freeport gate...right-clicking on it tells me it's a Lore Item.
>
> Anyone know of the person who initiates this quest?
>
> Thanks for any tips or spoilers. (I've run out of room in my bank vault
> to
> store things, so I need to complete a few quests.
>
> Fistlebane of Rathe server
>
>
>
